patthana21.7:1.1_0: Naanāsavaṁ nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā anāsavo kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana21.7:1.1_1: Naanāsavaṁ nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā sāsavo kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana21.7:2.1_0: Naanāsavaṁ naakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā sāsavo akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana21.7:3.1_0: Nasāsavaṁ naabyākataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sāsavo abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana21.7:3.1_1: Naanāsavaṁ naabyākataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sāsavo abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā dve,
